mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from product
order by ${orderByClause}

update product
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_TYPE_ID = #{record.productTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIMARY_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID = #{record.primaryProductCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANUFACTURER_PARTY_ID = #{record.manufacturerPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACILITY_ID = #{record.facilityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTRODUCTION_DATE = #{record.introductionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RELEASE_DATE = #{record.releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUPPORT_DISCONTINUATION_DATE = #{record.supportDiscontinuationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SALES_DISCONTINUATION_DATE = #{record.salesDiscontinuationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SALES_DISC_WHEN_NOT_AVAIL = #{record.salesDiscWhenNotAvail,jdbcType=CHAR},
INTERNAL_NAME = #{record.internalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND_NAME = #{record.brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENTS = #{record.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE_DETAIL_TEXT = #{record.priceDetailText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMALL_IMAGE_URL = #{record.smallImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIUM_IMAGE_URL = #{record.mediumImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LARGE_IMAGE_URL = #{record.largeImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL_IMAGE_URL = #{record.detailImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_IMAGE_URL = #{record.originalImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL_SCREEN = #{record.detailScreen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVENTORY_MESSAGE = #{record.inventoryMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVENTORY_ITEM_TYPE_ID = #{record.inventoryItemTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUIRE_INVENTORY = #{record.requireInventory,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUANTITY_UOM_ID = #{record.quantityUomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUANTITY_INCLUDED = #{record.quantityIncluded,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PIECES_INCLUDED = #{record.piecesIncluded,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REQUIRE_AMOUNT = #{record.requireAmount,jdbcType=CHAR},
FIXED_AMOUNT = #{record.fixedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT_UOM_TYPE_ID = #{record.amountUomTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT_UOM_ID = #{record.weightUomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIPPING_WEIGHT = #{record.shippingWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRODUCT_WEIGHT = #{record.productWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HEIGHT_UOM_ID = #{record.heightUomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_HEIGHT = #{record.productHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHIPPING_HEIGHT = #{record.shippingHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WIDTH_UOM_ID = #{record.widthUomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_WIDTH = #{record.productWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHIPPING_WIDTH = #{record.shippingWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPTH_UOM_ID = #{record.depthUomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_DEPTH = #{record.productDepth,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHIPPING_DEPTH = #{record.shippingDepth,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIAMETER_UOM_ID = #{record.diameterUomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_DIAMETER = #{record.productDiameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRODUCT_RATING = #{record.productRating,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RATING_TYPE_ENUM = #{record.ratingTypeEnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURNABLE = #{record.returnable,jdbcType=CHAR},
TAXABLE = #{record.taxable,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHARGE_SHIPPING = #{record.chargeShipping,jdbcType=CHAR},
AUTO_CREATE_KEYWORDS = #{record.autoCreateKeywords,jdbcType=CHAR},
INCLUDE_IN_PROMOTIONS = #{record.includeInPromotions,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_VIRTUAL = #{record.isVirtual,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_VARIANT = #{record.isVariant,jdbcType=CHAR},
VIRTUAL_VARIANT_METHOD_ENUM = #{record.virtualVariantMethodEnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_GEO_ID = #{record.originGeoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUIREMENT_METHOD_ENUM_ID = #{record.requirementMethodEnumId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_OF_MATERIAL_LEVEL = #{record.billOfMaterialLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESERV_MAX_PERSONS = #{record.reservMaxPersons,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESERV2ND_P_P_PERC = #{record.reserv2ndPPPerc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESERV_NTH_P_P_PERC = #{record.reservNthPPPerc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONFIG_ID = #{record.configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY_USER_LOGIN = #{record.createdByUserLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{record.lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_USER_LOGIN = #{record.lastModifiedByUserLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_SHIPPING_BOX = #{record.inShippingBox,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEFAULT_SHIPMENT_BOX_TYPE_ID = #{record.defaultShipmentBoxTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOT_ID_FILLED_IN = #{record.lotIdFilledIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DECIMAL_QUANTITY = #{record.orderDecimalQuantity,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAST_UPDATED_STAMP = NOW() , LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP = NOW() ,
LONG_DESCRIPTION = #{record.longDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
